=== LUGRadio Live ===

<nowiki>[[http://www.lugradio.org/live|LUGRadio Live]]</nowiki> is on 22-23 July 2006.

=== Ubuntu Users UK BOF Session ===
This is an informal meet-up of UK Ubuntu users, organised by JohnLevin.  Details can be found on the <nowiki>[[http://wiki.lugradio.org/index.php/LUGRadio_Live_2006_BOFs#UBUNTU_USERS_UK_BOF|LUGRadio BOF wiki page]]</nowiki>, where you can put your name down.

==== Minutes ====

Following the BOF, please add notes of what was discussed.

* Canonical requested case studies of people who have converted to Ubuntu, or just happen to use it.

=== Kubuntu at LugRadio Live 2006 ===

Kubuntu and KDE had a joint stand at Lugradio Live 2006.  Jonathan Riddell gave a talk about Kubuntu Dapper and KDE 4.

http://dot.kde.org/1154477463
http://www.flickr.com/photos/jriddell/tags/lugradiolive2006
